meanings.sent1: She unhaired the doll to give it a new look.
meanings.sent2: The groomer unhaired the dog before the dog show.
meanings.sent3: After the mishap with the glue, she had to unhair the craft project.
meanings.sent4: The magician seemed to unhair the rabbit out of thin air.
meanings.sent5: The barber skillfully unhaired the customer's beard with precision.

meanings.sent1: The unhaired cat enjoyed sunbathing on the warm windowsill.
meanings.sent2: The unhaired baby's head felt smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The unhaired peach looked funny among the fuzzy fruits.
meanings.sent4: The unhaired landscape was like a bald patch in the lush forest.
meanings.sent5: The unhaired mannequin displayed the latest hat fashion elegantly.
